title: Short-Intensive Course on Mobile-Based Interface Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Microlearning via smartphones in PC-unavailable settings, emphasizing practical interface design skills for integrating professional tasks.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze simple Java-based interface structures in mobile environments within 3 hours
Learners can correct interface errors ≤5 times using program frameworks and test cases
Learners can design interface prototypes applicable to real-world work scenarios within 1 week

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
